Making your own lessons is also easy. Save your time by picking the best images from our library of 3D models. From straight-up educational models to characters, animals, nature, buildings, even fantasy objects — use them as they originally are or transform them into your desired shapes.

3. Insert pictures, texts, or videos
Insert pictures from your device gallery, add videos from Youtube, or write on your projects using 3D texts. Drag and drop items freely into your project with our easy-peasy tools — no tutorials required!

4. Build from scratch if you feel like it
Alternatively, get creative by making your own models from scratch with our Classic Editor. Pull up thousands of basic shapes, colors, and textures, then transform them into something amazing.

5. Present in Augmented Reality (AR)
With Augmented Reality, you can place your 3D image as if it’s right in front of you. Inside the classroom, for instance! Preview your project in real-life setting, or share it as AR experience using printable & scannable QR markers.

6. Share it to your virtual classroom
Easily share AR lessons and collect projects from students in one place with the virtual classroom feature. Manage classes according to subjects and invite members in, so it’s easy for everyone to find things and see what’s going on.

7. Share it to the world!
Share your AR lessons directly to Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, and e-mail in a minute — or export 3D design as FBX/GLB/STL files for multi-platform usages: Facebook posts, PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

8. Learn from others and spread your knowledge
Get some insights by discovering other teachers and students’ awesome AR projects in the app. Be part of the EDU community by setting up a profile and publishing your projects or lessons in the app. Let the world discover your amazing materials!
